synopsis.text: Yoshizuki Mire, a 27-year-old Tokyo office worker who recently returned to Japan, Nagase Sora, a 22-year-old college student in her final year with dreams of becoming a teacher, and Kawatani Reika, a 20-year-old freelancer working part-time at an okonomiyaki shop in Hiroshima, find themselves at a crossroads in their lives.  Despite their diverse backgrounds and personal struggles, a shared love for an old anime, Magical DoReMi, brings them together.  Inspired by the anime, they each decide to visit one of the real-life locations featured in the show.  It is here that they meet by chance and form a bond that will change their lives forever.  Their journey begins when they discover a magic gem that sets them on a new, mystical path.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
